description: With its iconic sun graphic bringing the rays everywhere you wear it, our Smartwool® Sun Graphic Short Sleeve Tee is the definition of light. And with its odor-resistant Merino-poly fabric that helps manage moisture, regulate temperature, and dry quickly, this tee is also the definition of comfy. Great for a day at the beach or an afternoon with friends. Or really, go ahead and wear it anywhere tees are in style—which is everywhere, right?
name: Smartwool Smartwool Sun Graphic SS Tee - Unisex
